website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for customers wanting a larger Beanie Boo without purchasing the largest size available.
pros: This 9-inch unicorn is colorful and adorable
Makes a great gift for children who want a larger Beanie Boo that is still small enough for travel and storage
Customers love the sparkle design on the unicorn's hooves, horn, and eyes
cons: A few customers were accidentally sent the 6-inch version

customer_reviews.title: VERY cute and nice size for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had one in a smaller size and our puppy got ahold of it one morning. I jumped on Amazon, as she sleeps with that stuffy every night, and ordered this one. It arrived quickly and she loves it. Crisis averted!
customer_reviews.author: typninmypjs

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, so cute!! Came bigger than I thought!! Came with glitter on feet, ears, and horn, and falls off, but a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lily ozeruga

customer_reviews.title: My seven year old is so happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a bigger beanie boo. My daughter has been obsessed with these for a while now! This came super fast and I didn't have to drive all over town to find one she didn't already own lol. This is a well constructed beanie boo. This was reasonably priced and packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: john tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to complete her unicorn Family. She has this beanie boo in every size possible now. Super cute. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pastel.GothTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: How could you not love unicorns, especially ones this cute. Plus the seller is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Candyc17

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So cute and bigger than I thought i t would be.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday gift for a 6 year old who loves pink and unicorns...she absolutely loved this little doll. It's super soft and cuddly with big beautiful eyes. She loved it so much she fell asleep with it in her arms...she said to protect her against the monsters.....
customer_reviews.author: skyysmom

customer_reviews.title: Unicorns
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as she has quite a collection of Tys and loves unicorns.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche L. Gordan

customer_reviews.title: Hit with granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter's birthday and she just loves it. The eyes just sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I expected. My daughter loved it especially with the matching onesie pj’s.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: My money about time faster came back
customer_reviews.text: I payed for product run faster. I am disappointed because it arrived later. I'd like my money about time faster came back.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: It's so fluffy i'm gonna die!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! It will be a gift for my daughters 3rd birthday. Its a perfect fluffy unicorn.
customer_reviews.author: Lillymae

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute,, my granddaughter loves all of these animals. great gift for any little one or even any older one..lol
customer_reviews.author: angel girl

customer_reviews.title: Adorable beanie
customer_reviews.text: This stuffed animal was very cute and my neice loved it. I bought as part of a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: tina saylor

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old love beanie boos!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and cute. Great price for the bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. The silhouette picture represents the size well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent earlier than expected. Thanks. Product was as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Gold sparkles stiff on boo and come off easily. Otherwise grand daughter was delighted with Fantasia.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny2014

customer_reviews.title: Large size and super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and purchased two more as gifts. Everyone loves them. Large size and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: rex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved this item very soft perfect size for little kids and price was better than the ones I found at the stores
customer_reviews.author: Bel3

customer_reviews.title: Came in good condition. My daughter just loved it
customer_reviews.text: Medium size. Came in good condition. My daughter just loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: heather g

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it and it is of decent quality
customer_reviews.author: Tim T

customer_reviews.title: This plush was pretty big. I thought it will be smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: This plush was pretty big.I thought it will be smaller than that. The color of this plush and its eye color is gorgeous .
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect time for Easter
customer_reviews.text: This is to cute. Came in perfect time for Easter! If was unable to find this in stores. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Massongill

customer_reviews.title: she loved the unicorn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas, she's collecting beanie babies, she loved the unicorn. Great size, well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: and SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: For my granddaughter, and SUPER CUTE!! Arrived in less than a week. Couldn't ask for better service. Many thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What little girl wouldn't love a unicorn beanie boo that is pink and has gold glittered feet?
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size! Poor condition.
customer_reviews.text: Misleading description! Not a medium size 10” doll. This is a small 6” doll. Also not very good condition as listed. I didn’t know barely played with just a missing tag meant there would be a used earring through the foot. Clearly this toy was well loved and played with. Not what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Steff

customer_reviews.title: Thank you very much for such a wonderful product and great deal
customer_reviews.text: Got Fantasia as a birthday present for my daughter who is obsessed with Beanie Boos and she absolutely LOVES her! Thank you very much for such a wonderful product and great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my niece for her 6th birthday. She loved it. She collects the Beanie Boos. She has lots of the small and a few of the large ones. This one is medium size. Super soft and looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift for tweens
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect and a great gift for the 11 year old I gave it to.
customer_reviews.author: Nici

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: soooo cute@ a must buy for any unicorn lover :)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Fisher
